embeds.title: Drake (Fiche)
embeds.description:
Résumé : Drake
Original character with Lightning-type abilities across all three weapons. Known for his Longsword Pulse ability that buffs team Burst Gauge, making him a strong secondary character. His Greatsword playstyle builds King's Magic stacks for massive Ultimate damage multipliers.
